nodes.text: Dolla was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Western Reaches. It was also situated in the grid square L-18 of the Standard Galactic Grid. Dolla was connected via hyperspace routes to the celestial body Karfeddion in the Mid Rim as well as the Outer Rim's Eriadu system and the astronomical object Bavva.

Dolla was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the January 29, 2016 StarWars.com article "Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?" by Mark Newbold. Dolla was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 10: Bounty Hunters, which was was authored by Rick D. Stuart and published by West End Games for use with Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
